Open Science Workshop Melbourne - Call for participation!

Posted on June 3, 2014 by Noon van der Silk

So we’re launching the first Open Science Workshop in Melbourne, on the 19th of July.

Find out more over at the official call for participation.

Tell everyone you know! Come along! I hope to see you there!
